code: @Override public T get(IndexSettings indexSettings, Environment environment, String name, Settings settings) throws IOException {     Version versionCreated = Version.indexCreated(settings).     synchronized (this) {         T factory = cache.get(versionCreated).         if (factory == null) {             factory = create(versionCreated).             cache.put(versionCreated, factory).         }         return factory.     } }

code: /**  * The name of the analysis component in the API.  */ public String getName() {     return name. }
